thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Geremia Pools and Landscaping

author: Geremia Pools and Landscaping
title: Geremia Pools and Landscaping
text: What we really like about Zip Recruiter is how user friendly the site is. Listing and posting our job openings are done in a snap, and the help section is actually, "helpful". My favorite component is the live chat- if we have any questions we get answers fast, in real time. I chatted with "Sam", who is a live person not a "bot", and Sam assisted in creating a more well rounded listing for our company. Thank you for the help. So far so good!
